alert.note: Alert for Pope; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pope, south central Todd and northwestern Stearns Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 730 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brooten, or 25 miles south of Alexandria, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sauk Centre, Melrose and Grey Eagle. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 123 and 144. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 150 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
